  • Uses of Tile in map.tile

    Subclasses of Tile in map.tile
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    TileManager
    The TileManager class handles tile management, including loading tile images, setting up tile properties, loading the map layout from a file, and drawing tiles on the screen based on the player's position.
